pages.title: As Old as the Trees
pages.text: Until now, you've been abusing the local $(thing)Aura$(), draining it with your $(item)Natural Altar$(). It's nigh time we change that. With the $(item)Pyre$(), you can create the herb $(item)Pereskia$(). Exposing a $(item)Dusk Sapling$() to this, along with some $(item)Crystal Flowers$() and other ingredients, will morph the sapling into an $(item)Ancient Acorn$(), which when grown, exudes $(thing)Aura$() from its leaves.
Unfortunately, $(item)Ancient Trees$() can do no more than restore the $(thing)Aura$() to a neutral level. I've jotted down some notes on other ways to increase $(thing)Aura$() levels here.
